blog.description:
Collector and lover of Comics, Art, Music, Film, literature, Toys😐... 
Hobbies include, Comic collecting, Art collecting, Film collecting, Photography, Creating Digital Art, my pets, Ps4: DiRRtySouthPlaya
Horror is my favorite genre of any subject. 
Im a Professional Picture Framer and Art Dealer. 
I'm extremely Sarcastic, dry, contemplative, and accepting of all and their beliefs... But remember I have my own beliefs as well! And, thats what they are, PERSONAL BELIEFS. *Let us not blur Fact from opinion!* 
Hunter S Thompson is my literary idol. Film idols... too many to list. Music idols would be Ice Cube, or Jim Morrison. Comedic Idols include George Carlin, Richard Pryor, David Cross, Chris Rock, ANY MONTY PYTHON.
My dream is to one day be a film editor, a Special FX master, An Established Photographer, or a Comedian. (Though oddly most of my jokes end up angering or annoying.)
Very socially awkward as all get out, as you'll soon see!

body:
Rule nr 1 (Sequel) - One-Shot 3 : Rogers ‘’Old’’ Flame

Pairing : Avengers x Plus Size Reader

Warnings : Language ; spelling/grammar mistakes ; mention of death ; slut-shaming

Word Count : 1.9K

A/N : Italic = Thoughts

Three weeks. It’s been three weeks after your mission at the ‘Chaud’ Club (One-shot 1). Three weeks you’ve been tracking the intel gathered on Dylan Rim’s phone and three weeks you’ve been vanishing at night to investigate your own leads. You were going out with Maya when you heard someone laugh. Discreetly you walked to the source and discovered Rogers smiling like a kid and talking to no other than Sharon Carter. You stepped in the kitchen, startling them and declared with a fake smile « Hello » Rogers shifted a little in his seat and Sharon smiled back at you « Hi I’m Sharon », she said. « I know », you answered emotionless. She giggled and replied « I guess my reputation preceded me » You nodded doubtful and provoked her « What have you been up to. Last time I heard about you was that you were involved in the battle that divided the Avengers. » Your question caught them off guard but reading Rogers’s mind, you knew he was as intrigued as you. Sharon blushed and cleared her throat « I..I had to deal with my aunts Peggy’s things. » You narrowed your eyes and looked at Rogers who immediately fell smitten at the word ‘Peggy’. Sharon was good, she knew how to turn this in her favor. « Anyway have a nice day », you spat at them. You didn’t know yet but that woman was trouble.

You met Maya and caught up on your respective lifes. « How are you? Keeping yourself out of trouble? », she asked amused. You fake gasped and replied « Me? I’m a saint », to which she laughed loudly. « Yeah yeah a saint. Hilarious », she mumbled while taking a gulp of her water. You smirked and wiggled your eyebrows. « What about you? Everything alright? » She nodded and informed you that life was great on her side and that she missed you. You gave her a small smile and told her that you missed her too. « Maya can I ask you something? » She gave you a concerned look and you calmed her down. « It’s no big deal but just wanted to ask your opinion. » She nodded and made a sign for you to continue. « If there’s someone on the team that is reconnecting with someone from their past but you would find that odd or the person in question doubtful and kinda weird in the trusty way, would you tell your team mate? » She thought about it before replying « If that person is a cause to create tensions then yes I would, no matter who it is. » 

She looked at you and you sighed after hearing her thoughts. « Fine. It’s Steve Rogers. I saw him today in the kitchen with Sharon Carter. I don’t know but I don’t trust her. She seemed way ‘too perfect’ and always using Peggy as her shield, it just makes me sick », you revealed. Maya frowned and asked « What about her thoughts? » You let a deep breath « That’s the thing she seemed to really focus and think on how to get Rogers on her bed, but it didn’t fell real. » Maya nodded and confirmed you that you should tell Rogers about your gut. You ended your day and head back to the compound.

You saw Wilson and Barnes on the couch and joined them. « Hey Tik and Tak, what are you watching? », you asked amused. Barnes frowned having no idea what you just called them and Wilson gave you a small sarcastic laugh « Ha ha ha aren’t you hilarious », Wilson said. You smiled brightly and responded « Yeah I know that’s actually my real talent. » They chuckled and shook their heads. You sat down with them on whatever movie they were watching when the elevator dinged. Rogers came out of it with Sharon. They were holding hands and he seemed happy. ‘Why is it always me to have to break that guy’s heart?’, you thought. They shared a cheesy couple kiss and she left, battling her eyelashes. Wilson and Barnes were looking proud at Rogers and you were just suspicious.

« How was it? », asked Barnes with a smile. Rogers shrugged and replied « It was really great. » Wilson congratulated him and so did Barnes. Rogers looked at you expecting your opinion but boy he was not ready for what came next. « I’m glad you’re good again, I just don’t think going out with her is the best thing. » He frowned at your comment, hurt. « Why not? », he said annoyed. You stood up and walked his way, trying to say it calmly. « I don’t know I just think you deserve better. » He chuckled dryly and started « What do you care if I deserve better or not. Are you jealous or something? »

It was your turn to chuckle « Me jealous? Why would I be jealous Rogers? », you asked annoyed. The tension was beginning to grow and so was our mutual anger. « Oh I don’t know that maybe someone is into me and not into you », he spat. You laughed and declared « Don’t be ridiculous Rogers, that’s insane. » He frowned and clenched his jaw « Well maybe if you weren’t such a horrible person, someone would actually want to date you. Instead you’re there dressing like a slut and making out with some fetishist ! », he said bitterly. Your smile vanished and you slapped him hard in the face (reference to the Marvel Parody Series, Part 13). You stormed out of the place into your room and entered inside. You asked F.R.I.D.A.Y to lock the door and not open it on any circumstance.

Barnes and Wilson looked shocked at Rogers behavior and he left his head fall. « Dude that wasn’t nice », exclaimed Wilson. « I know I just lost it », whispered Rogers. Barnes didn’t say anything but his disappointed look told everything his best friend needed to know. Rogers made his way to your room and knocked. « Y/N… look I’m sorry. I don’t know what came up to me. Open up. » You gave him no response. He stood in front of your room for hours but you never answered. You stayed in your room a whole week, not wanting to see anyone. Several times a day, people would knock on your door, pleading for you to get out and at least eat something but again you would never respond.

« What the fuck Steve », yelled Romanoff at the Soldier on day 2. « I know I know. I’m trying to apologize. » She shook her head and replied « It’s gonna take you way more than just stand there in front of a door and just say sorry. You slut-shamed her. You of all people and she just gave you an honest opinion. If it was me saying that Sharon wasn’t the one for you, never in the world you would act that way. You should be ashamed of yourself ! », she told him angrily and left. Rogers felt bad and indeed ashamed of his attitude.

A week later, you got out of your room and headed to the kitchen. When you entered the conversations ended and you just took your cup of coffee. « Hey Y/N how are you? », asked Wilson. « I’ve never been better », you lied. You looked at everyone except for the Soldier who you ignored. « Is there any mission on the plate today? », you asked Stark. « Yes just reckon. I was gonna send Clint », he answered. You nodded and said « I’ll go with him, if it’s ok with you », you turned to the Archer. He gave you a small smile and nodded. You walked out and heard Rogers call for you and on the corner where he couldn’t see you, you vanished.

The reckon was alright. With Barton you got Hydra’s location and got their evil plan. That’s when you saw her walk. You nodged Barton in the ribs and made him turn you way. He now was your witness - Sharon Carter in flesh and bones with the enemy. He nodded and you both joined the quinjet. « She was there », was all he said. « Yep, I knew she was fucking shady », was the last thing you said. During the briefing Barton told them what you’ve found and that Sharon was there. Again Rogers didn’t want to believe it but Barton insisted that he saw it with his own eyes and he couldn’t deny his friends’s sayings.

The team was suited and were about to leave when they saw you in your pjs in the couch. « What the hell are you doing? », asked Stark. You continued to read the stupid magazine in your hands and just declared « Have fun. » Barnes stepped in front of you and kneeled « Look we know you’re upset right now but we need you. » You looked him in the eyes and give him a cold gaze. « No you don’t and you never did. I’m sure you can handle this all by yourselves. I’m not coming, I’m just a horrible person. » He sighed and stood up giving Rogers a deadly stare. « Fine whatever let’s go. We’ll deal with this later », told Stark and they left.

Three hours later, the elevators dinged and everyone came out of it. They were bruised and their suits were half destroyed. « Seems like you had fun », you spat sarcastically. « That’s enough. You compromised the whole team with your childish behavior », exclaimed a furious Rogers. You ignored him and walked to Barnes. « Hey baby you alright? I missed you », you told him and everybody looked shocked. « I’m ok…doll missed you too. » You kissed him deeply and embraced him. You stepped out of the kiss and looked him in the eyes before whispering « You should know your targets more » and his eyes widened. You then whispered slowly so that no one else could here but only him « I’m Nyx by the way » and you saw his horrified face. You took a hidden knife and sliced his throat. Everyone was either shocked or started screaming. Romanoff pointed a gun at your head and Rogers was kneeled in front of Barnes.

The next thing heard in the room was the elevator. Barnes came out of it, confused of the scene in front of him. Rogers looked back at the body in front of him and saw the body transform. « It’s a shapeshifter », you exclaimed. Romanoff put down her gun and you continued « You really think I was dating Barnes? How couldn’t you notice that it wasn’t him. » No one said anything. « How? How? did you? », stuttered Rogers. You chuckled dryly. « Barnes always has an elastic hair on his right wrist in case he wants to put them in a man-bun, his posture was different and when I embraced him his arm, well no metal. And clearly he thought we were together which we aren’t. » Rogers stood up dumbfounded and you spat at him « I just solved this case, here in the compound, in my pjs. You’re welcome. » You were about to leave when you turned around and declared « Your girl Sharon » and you pointed to the body, « It wasn’t the real one, that’s why she seemed odd to me and I told you, you deserved better. » With that said you left to your room. A few hours later, F.R.I.D.A.Y confirmed you that Stark managed to find Sharon Carter tied to a chair in another state.

It took you five months to forgive Rogers for his attitude. At the beginning you would come with them on missions and follow the instructions but as soon you were at the compound, you shut the Soldier off your life. He was desperate and did everything he could to have your forgiveness, telling you he didn’t mean what he said, that his attitude was horrible and that he trusted you with his whole being. Five months later you forgave him and included him back in your life. 

*gifs not mine, credit to owner*

TAG LIST for the SERIES : @kyber-hearts-and-stardust-souls @buckybarneslemons @brennan1618 @alexfayer @totally-alexa21 @lovesteverogersbaeworld @bulbachu13 @oliviajmarvel @the-lachrymose-one @poetic-pixie  @kendrawr-kitkat @5aftermidnight @hoibetty @thewayilookatbacon @d0nt-apologise @wakandaforever11 @multifandom-reallyamess @depressivegoblin @xxleannewardxx @pixiehex1985 @kittyjs123 @yafriendlyfangirl @gaylemonshark @ludmi0u0 @missphoenix69 @marshmallow-witch @everydayisonfire @papayapagan @llfuture-disney-princessll-blog @clockworkmorningglory @angieptt @shockwavee @lilulo-12 @introvertedsin @ismeewhores @fanfictionrecommendations-com @wildsoul1221 @prettybubblesintheair @wayward-timetravel-collecter @lokithedancingqueen @francezka10 @tnupsweetpie

trail.content_raw:
Rule nr 1 (Sequel) - One-Shot 3 : Rogers ‘’Old’’ Flame

Pairing : Avengers x Plus Size Reader

Warnings : Language ; spelling/grammar mistakes ; mention of death ; slut-shaming

Word Count : 1.9K

A/N : Italic = Thoughts

Three weeks. It’s been three weeks after your mission at the ‘Chaud’ Club (One-shot 1). Three weeks you’ve been tracking the intel gathered on Dylan Rim’s phone and three weeks you’ve been vanishing at night to investigate your own leads. You were going out with Maya when you heard someone laugh. Discreetly you walked to the source and discovered Rogers smiling like a kid and talking to no other than Sharon Carter. You stepped in the kitchen, startling them and declared with a fake smile « Hello » Rogers shifted a little in his seat and Sharon smiled back at you « Hi I’m Sharon », she said. « I know », you answered emotionless. She giggled and replied « I guess my reputation preceded me » You nodded doubtful and provoked her « What have you been up to. Last time I heard about you was that you were involved in the battle that divided the Avengers. » Your question caught them off guard but reading Rogers’s mind, you knew he was as intrigued as you. Sharon blushed and cleared her throat « I..I had to deal with my aunts Peggy’s things. » You narrowed your eyes and looked at Rogers who immediately fell smitten at the word ‘Peggy’. Sharon was good, she knew how to turn this in her favor. « Anyway have a nice day », you spat at them. You didn’t know yet but that woman was trouble.

You met Maya and caught up on your respective lifes. « How are you? Keeping yourself out of trouble? », she asked amused. You fake gasped and replied « Me? I’m a saint », to which she laughed loudly. « Yeah yeah a saint. Hilarious », she mumbled while taking a gulp of her water. You smirked and wiggled your eyebrows. « What about you? Everything alright? » She nodded and informed you that life was great on her side and that she missed you. You gave her a small smile and told her that you missed her too. « Maya can I ask you something? » She gave you a concerned look and you calmed her down. « It’s no big deal but just wanted to ask your opinion. » She nodded and made a sign for you to continue. « If there’s someone on the team that is reconnecting with someone from their past but you would find that odd or the person in question doubtful and kinda weird in the trusty way, would you tell your team mate? » She thought about it before replying « If that person is a cause to create tensions then yes I would, no matter who it is. » 

She looked at you and you sighed after hearing her thoughts. « Fine. It’s Steve Rogers. I saw him today in the kitchen with Sharon Carter. I don’t know but I don’t trust her. She seemed way ‘too perfect’ and always using Peggy as her shield, it just makes me sick », you revealed. Maya frowned and asked « What about her thoughts? » You let a deep breath « That’s the thing she seemed to really focus and think on how to get Rogers on her bed, but it didn’t fell real. » Maya nodded and confirmed you that you should tell Rogers about your gut. You ended your day and head back to the compound.

You saw Wilson and Barnes on the couch and joined them. « Hey Tik and Tak, what are you watching? », you asked amused. Barnes frowned having no idea what you just called them and Wilson gave you a small sarcastic laugh « Ha ha ha aren’t you hilarious », Wilson said. You smiled brightly and responded « Yeah I know that’s actually my real talent. » They chuckled and shook their heads. You sat down with them on whatever movie they were watching when the elevator dinged. Rogers came out of it with Sharon. They were holding hands and he seemed happy. ‘Why is it always me to have to break that guy’s heart?’, you thought. They shared a cheesy couple kiss and she left, battling her eyelashes. Wilson and Barnes were looking proud at Rogers and you were just suspicious.

« How was it? », asked Barnes with a smile. Rogers shrugged and replied « It was really great. » Wilson congratulated him and so did Barnes. Rogers looked at you expecting your opinion but boy he was not ready for what came next. « I’m glad you’re good again, I just don’t think going out with her is the best thing. » He frowned at your comment, hurt. « Why not? », he said annoyed. You stood up and walked his way, trying to say it calmly. « I don’t know I just think you deserve better. » He chuckled dryly and started « What do you care if I deserve better or not. Are you jealous or something? »

It was your turn to chuckle « Me jealous? Why would I be jealous Rogers? », you asked annoyed. The tension was beginning to grow and so was our mutual anger. « Oh I don’t know that maybe someone is into me and not into you », he spat. You laughed and declared « Don’t be ridiculous Rogers, that’s insane. » He frowned and clenched his jaw « Well maybe if you weren’t such a horrible person, someone would actually want to date you. Instead you’re there dressing like a slut and making out with some fetishist ! », he said bitterly. Your smile vanished and you slapped him hard in the face (reference to the Marvel Parody Series, Part 13). You stormed out of the place into your room and entered inside. You asked F.R.I.D.A.Y to lock the door and not open it on any circumstance.

Barnes and Wilson looked shocked at Rogers behavior and he left his head fall. « Dude that wasn’t nice », exclaimed Wilson. « I know I just lost it », whispered Rogers. Barnes didn’t say anything but his disappointed look told everything his best friend needed to know. Rogers made his way to your room and knocked. « Y/N… look I’m sorry. I don’t know what came up to me. Open up. » You gave him no response. He stood in front of your room for hours but you never answered. You stayed in your room a whole week, not wanting to see anyone. Several times a day, people would knock on your door, pleading for you to get out and at least eat something but again you would never respond.

« What the fuck Steve », yelled Romanoff at the Soldier on day 2. « I know I know. I’m trying to apologize. » She shook her head and replied « It’s gonna take you way more than just stand there in front of a door and just say sorry. You slut-shamed her. You of all people and she just gave you an honest opinion. If it was me saying that Sharon wasn’t the one for you, never in the world you would act that way. You should be ashamed of yourself ! », she told him angrily and left. Rogers felt bad and indeed ashamed of his attitude.

A week later, you got out of your room and headed to the kitchen. When you entered the conversations ended and you just took your cup of coffee. « Hey Y/N how are you? », asked Wilson. « I’ve never been better », you lied. You looked at everyone except for the Soldier who you ignored. « Is there any mission on the plate today? », you asked Stark. « Yes just reckon. I was gonna send Clint », he answered. You nodded and said « I’ll go with him, if it’s ok with you », you turned to the Archer. He gave you a small smile and nodded. You walked out and heard Rogers call for you and on the corner where he couldn’t see you, you vanished.

The reckon was alright. With Barton you got Hydra’s location and got their evil plan. That’s when you saw her walk. You nodged Barton in the ribs and made him turn you way. He now was your witness - Sharon Carter in flesh and bones with the enemy. He nodded and you both joined the quinjet. « She was there », was all he said. « Yep, I knew she was fucking shady », was the last thing you said. During the briefing Barton told them what you’ve found and that Sharon was there. Again Rogers didn’t want to believe it but Barton insisted that he saw it with his own eyes and he couldn’t deny his friends’s sayings.

The team was suited and were about to leave when they saw you in your pjs in the couch. « What the hell are you doing? », asked Stark. You continued to read the stupid magazine in your hands and just declared « Have fun. » Barnes stepped in front of you and kneeled « Look we know you’re upset right now but we need you. » You looked him in the eyes and give him a cold gaze. « No you don’t and you never did. I’m sure you can handle this all by yourselves. I’m not coming, I’m just a horrible person. » He sighed and stood up giving Rogers a deadly stare. « Fine whatever let’s go. We’ll deal with this later », told Stark and they left.

Three hours later, the elevators dinged and everyone came out of it. They were bruised and their suits were half destroyed. « Seems like you had fun », you spat sarcastically. « That’s enough. You compromised the whole team with your childish behavior », exclaimed a furious Rogers. You ignored him and walked to Barnes. « Hey baby you alright? I missed you », you told him and everybody looked shocked. « I’m ok…doll missed you too. » You kissed him deeply and embraced him. You stepped out of the kiss and looked him in the eyes before whispering « You should know your targets more » and his eyes widened. You then whispered slowly so that no one else could here but only him « I’m Nyx by the way » and you saw his horrified face. You took a hidden knife and sliced his throat. Everyone was either shocked or started screaming. Romanoff pointed a gun at your head and Rogers was kneeled in front of Barnes.

The next thing heard in the room was the elevator. Barnes came out of it, confused of the scene in front of him. Rogers looked back at the body in front of him and saw the body transform. « It’s a shapeshifter », you exclaimed. Romanoff put down her gun and you continued « You really think I was dating Barnes? How couldn’t you notice that it wasn’t him. » No one said anything. « How? How? did you? », stuttered Rogers. You chuckled dryly. « Barnes always has an elastic hair on his right wrist in case he wants to put them in a man-bun, his posture was different and when I embraced him his arm, well no metal. And clearly he thought we were together which we aren’t. » Rogers stood up dumbfounded and you spat at him « I just solved this case, here in the compound, in my pjs. You’re welcome. » You were about to leave when you turned around and declared « Your girl Sharon » and you pointed to the body, « It wasn’t the real one, that’s why she seemed odd to me and I told you, you deserved better. » With that said you left to your room. A few hours later, F.R.I.D.A.Y confirmed you that Stark managed to find Sharon Carter tied to a chair in another state.

It took you five months to forgive Rogers for his attitude. At the beginning you would come with them on missions and follow the instructions but as soon you were at the compound, you shut the Soldier off your life. He was desperate and did everything he could to have your forgiveness, telling you he didn’t mean what he said, that his attitude was horrible and that he trusted you with his whole being. Five months later you forgave him and included him back in your life.

blog.name: thanos-is-a-bitch
blog.title: Nerdy Shit
blog.description: 20/Canada/shoot me a message if you want

summary: You can not like a character, that's totally fine and understandable. But don't come at me with any Tony Stark is selfish...
body:
You can not like a character, that’s totally fine and understandable. But don’t come at me with any Tony Stark is selfish bullshit or that he broke up the avengers.

-First off are we forgetting that he risked his life by flying a nuke into a wormhole? That he was willing to die to save thousands of lives?

-his worst fear was his friends dying

-the reason he created ultron in the first place was because he wanted to protect the world from those that would destroy it

-people forget that his original plan for the accords was to amend them until they suited the avengers and Steve’s wishes

-people get mad at him for putting Wanda on house arrest but ignore that fact that others wanted her either deported or detained??? Like?? Her powers resulted in 11 people dying, (I’m not blaming her, it was an accident and more people might’ve died if she hadn’t done what she did) that’s not something the public can ignore. It’s not like the compound was some shitty little house that she was stuck in.

-people also get mad at him for bringing Peter but assuming from the way others talk about her, Wanda isn’t much older? Steve himself calls her a kid???

-like if we’re speaking raw strength wise, Peter is stronger the Steve. The dude can stop spreading busses like it’s nothing. Also if you think that Peter was is serious danger then you’re also saying that Cap’s team was out to kill

-I’ve seen numerous posts blame him for Rhodey getting shot down but Rhodey was the one who told vision to turn Sam into a glider

-when he found out the truth about Bucky being framed he immediately went to help Steve despite what was going on between the two of them

-he gets a lot of hate from antis for the way he reacted to finding out his parents were murdered by the winter soldier. Like yeah sure it had been over 20 years since their deaths, but the entire time Tony had thought it was an accident only to find out it wasn’t. He reacted out of anger, the way almost anyone would.

-Tony trying to kill Bucky could’ve been avoided if Steve “teammates shouldn’t keep secrets” Rogers had been honest with Tony from the start.

-he built a suit with every possible precaution to keep Peter safe

-taking Peter’s suit away ultimately did more harm that good, but Tony took it away in the hopes that Peter would leave the vulture to the authorities and in doing so would be keeping Peter safe. He’s stated that he feels personally responsible for Peter’s safety.

I could go on but everything that goes bad gets pinned on Tony. Like ultron for example, Wanda messing with his head led him to the idea of protecting everyone and Bruce helped him create ultron. Idk I’m just sick of unreasonable Tony hate

-like if we’re speaking raw strength wise, Peter is stronger the Steve. The dude can stop spreading busses like it’s nothing. Also if you think that Peter was is serious danger then you’re also saying that Cap’s team was out to kill

-I’ve seen numerous posts blame him for Rhodey getting shot down but Rhodey was the one who told vision to turn Sam into a glider

-when he found out the truth about Bucky being framed he immediately went to help Steve despite what was going on between the two of them

-he gets a lot of hate from antis for the way he reacted to finding out his parents were murdered by the winter soldier. Like yeah sure it had been over 20 years since their deaths, but the entire time Tony had thought it was an accident only to find out it wasn’t. He reacted out of anger, the way almost anyone would.

-Tony trying to kill Bucky could’ve been avoided if Steve “teammates shouldn’t keep secrets” Rogers had been honest with Tony from the start.

-he built a suit with every possible precaution to keep Peter safe

-taking Peter’s suit away ultimately did more harm that good, but Tony took it away in the hopes that Peter would leave the vulture to the authorities and in doing so would be keeping Peter safe. He’s stated that he feels personally responsible for Peter’s safety.

I could go on but everything that goes bad gets pinned on Tony. Like ultron for example, Wanda messing with his head led him to the idea of protecting everyone and Bruce helped him create ultron. Idk I’m just sick of unreasonable Tony hate

-the reason he created ultron in the first place was because he wanted to protect the world from those that would destroy it

title: The Craigslist Date - Chapter 9
body:
I’m really proud of the first part of this. The second part… well, I feel like I suck at writing action sequences. But the first part contains a few lines I read and think, “Dang, I did good,” so that’s nice.

As always, feedback is super appreciated!

Many thanks to @unwrapping for having a post on how to use the “keep reading” feature. Yay, I can use that now!

Word count: 1514

Warnings: That action sequence at the end (bad writing and angst), references to adults doing things that make me wish my mom didn’t read these (she does. *sigh*)

——————————

You landed hard on your back and for a moment you couldn’t breathe. Natasha grinned down at you in victory.

“And I win again. Really, Y/N, I expected you to be better at this after a week of training.”

“You call this training?” You groaned as you pushed yourself into a sitting position. “It’s just you showing me a move or two before knocking me on my ass for two hours.”

“Believe it or not, you are improving,” Nat assured you as she grabbed your hand and hauled you to your feet.

“Then why have I never been this sore before in my life?” You rubbed your back, wincing as you hit what had to be a pretty big bruise. “It keeps compounding. I thought yesterday was bad, but today is definitely worse.”

“And you’ll thank me for it the first time you have to work through pain on a mission.”

You glared at the pretty Russian. “I’m not joining the team, Nat. I’m just supposed to be learning how to defend myself.”

She waved off your protest. “Then you’ll thank me when you have to work through pain when fighting for your life. Until you can at least hold your own against me, we’ll keep working. Let’s run it one more time.”

“I want Steve back,” you complained.

“Ask and you shall receive.”

You whirled around to face the voice behind you, only to have Natasha flip you once again. The floor rushing up to meet you knocked the breath out of your lungs and you swore you saw Jesus.

“Damnit, Nat!” you gasped out.

“You were distracted,” she smirked.

“Of course I was distracted, my boyfriend’s back!”

Steve ducked into the ring and glanced at Natasha before smiling down at you.

“Hard at work, I see.”

“Steve,” you whined, “Nat is being mean to me.”

He laughed and held out a hand for you to grab. You shook your head.

“I think I’ll just stay down here for a while. Less distance to fall.”

Clint and Bucky wandered into the gym and saw you on your back.

“Looks like someone’s been training with Nat,” Clint teased. “How many times has she beaten you?”

“Two hundred and fifty-two times. Forty eight of those were today.”

He cracked up. “You’ve been counting?”

You sighed, sitting up and crossing your legs. “Of course I’ve been counting. I get a new bruise each time.”

“Let’s test you out,” Steve said, again holding out his hand to pull you up. You reluctantly acquiesced.

“Fine, but I want to fight Clint this time.”

“I’ll have you know I can hold my own against Nat,” Clint objected indignantly.

“And she beats you every time,” Bucky teased, elbowing him in the ribs. “Fight the woman.”

Clint assented and joined you as Steve and Natasha vacated the ring.

“You’ve got this, Y/N,” Nat assured you from the ropes. “Just remember what we’ve worked on.”

Maybe Clint wasn’t expecting you to be able to hold your own or maybe you really were getting better. For whatever reason, you found yourself reacting automatically to his attacks, and soon he was the one to hit the floor. You turned to your cheering fans to bow and he swept out a leg, knocking you down next to him.

“What did I tell you about getting distracted?” Nat laughed as you sat up and shoved Clint.

“Low blow, Barton.”

“But totally worth the look on your face,” he joked. “Next time I’ll take you down first and you can land the belated attempt to save face.”

“Next time will have to be another day,” you announced as you got up. “I get to go back to work today, and I definitely need a shower before I leave.”

“I’ll clean up and go with you.” Steve picked up his duffle.

“No, you,” you ordered, poking him in the chest, “are going to shower after I do, followed by food or whatever you need to be ready for when I get back. Tony is going with me.” You stood on your tiptoes and whispered in his ear, “You’ve been gone a week. I’m jumping you as soon as I’m off work. I want you wide awake.” With a sly grin, you stalked off to take your shower.

“Well, something’s got the Captain blushing,” Bucky teased as he and Clint followed your exit, headed to their rooms.

Natasha came up and stood beside Steve, watching you retreat across the gym. “You’ve got a special one there, Cap. Don’t let her get away.”

Steve nodded, the scarlet slowly leaving his cheeks. “Believe me, I fully intend to keep her.”

 ———-

“F.R.I.D.A.Y., tell Happy to bring the car around in fifteen minutes. I want him waiting by the curb when we step out.”

“Yes, sir.”

Tony sipped his coffee and continued to pretend to read. He had tapped into the shop’s security system and was viewing all the camera feeds on a screen carefully built into his fake newspaper. Your shift had gone smoothly so far, but it was almost 4 p.m. and that meant you were about to enter the most vulnerable part of your time outside the tower: travelling.

Happy pulled up just as you came out of the back with your purse. You nodded at Tony and he stood, taking your arm. You were both on high alert as he opened the door and you slid in.

“Give us a different route than the one we took to get here,” Tony called up to Happy as he slid in behind you and shut the door. “Make it unpredictable.”

Happy nodded at him in the rear-view mirror and pulled away from the curb. He hadn’t even fully entered the flow of traffic when you heard a small thud from the roof.

“F.R.I.D.A.Y., what just landed?” Tony asked, his armor starting to form around him.

“It’s some sort of device. I’m scanning it but I’ve never seen anything like it before. I have no idea what it does.”

“All right, Happy, pull over! We’re going on foot. Ditch the car just in case but wait nearby for backup.”

“I’ve alerted the team,” F.R.I.D.A.Y. informed you both. “A quinjet is en route.”

“Put it on, Y/N. We’re going out.” Tony stepped out of the car and shielded you with himself, scanning the entire area and taking a quick look at the disc attached to the roof of the SUV.

You reached into your purse and pulled out a metal triangle that Tony had given you. When you pressed it against your chest it spread out, enveloping you in some sort of armor. Tony pulled you out behind him and dragged you to an alley nearby.

“What are we doing?” you breathed nervously.

“You are staying behind me and up against this wall,” Tony informed you tersely, his voice sounding metallic through his mask. “I am standing between you and the rest of the world until the quinjet arrives and you’re safe with Cap.”

Three men slipped from the shadows and attacked. While Tony fended them off, you felt yourself being jerked upward. Another attacker had repelled down the building and grabbed you from behind.

“Tony!” you cried out before a hand clamped over your mouth. He looked up and saw you as snipers began shooting from the roof behind you. He left the men below and dodged the bullets on his way up.

You were on the roof now and had more space to maneuver. You managed to shake off the man holding you, but two more were waiting and they attacked as soon as you were free. You had never tried to fend off multiple attackers before, and found yourself quickly failing.

Tony landed and began fighting off the others who joined your attackers, but he couldn’t blast at them without fear of hitting you. You felt a rising panic as a helicopter flew up and hovered low over where you were fighting. The quinjet was nowhere in sight.

Arms grabbed you and pinned your hands behind your back, dragging you towards a ladder lowering from the helicopter. You couldn’t fight, but you refused to be taken again.

“No!” you yelled, ripping yourself from their arms. At your burst of emotion, a wave of energy pulsed from your body. Tony’s armor went dark and the helicopter lost power, crashing down the side of the building and into the street below. The energy knocked your attackers back, and before they could regain their footing a shield flew from behind you and knocked three of them out.

Steve was here, followed by Clint and Bucky. Nat held the quinjet in a hover above you and lowered a rope, which you caught so she could pull you up.

“I’m getting you out of here,” she called to you as she pulled the jet around. “The others will clean up.”

You looked out the window of the jet, worry curling in your stomach as you watched Steve fight through the HYDRA agents. As he shrank in the distance, you prayed he would be all right.

Happy nodded at him in the rear-view mirror and pulled away from the curb. He hadn’t even fully entered the flow of traffic when you heard a small thud from the roof.

“F.R.I.D.A.Y., what just landed?” Tony asked, his armor starting to form around him.

“It’s some sort of device. I’m scanning it but I’ve never seen anything like it before. I have no idea what it does.”

“All right, Happy, pull over! We’re going on foot. Ditch the car just in case but wait nearby for backup.”

“I’ve alerted the team,” F.R.I.D.A.Y. informed you both. “A quinjet is en route.”

“Put it on, Y/N. We’re going out.” Tony stepped out of the car and shielded you with himself, scanning the entire area and taking a quick look at the disc attached to the roof of the SUV.

You reached into your purse and pulled out a metal triangle that Tony had given you. When you pressed it against your chest it spread out, enveloping you in some sort of armor. Tony pulled you out behind him and dragged you to an alley nearby.

“What are we doing?” you breathed nervously.

“You are staying behind me and up against this wall,” Tony informed you tersely, his voice sounding metallic through his mask. “I am standing between you and the rest of the world until the quinjet arrives and you’re safe with Cap.”

Three men slipped from the shadows and attacked. While Tony fended them off, you felt yourself being jerked upward. Another attacker had repelled down the building and grabbed you from behind.

“Tony!” you cried out before a hand clamped over your mouth. He looked up and saw you as snipers began shooting from the roof behind you. He left the men below and dodged the bullets on his way up.

You were on the roof now and had more space to maneuver. You managed to shake off the man holding you, but two more were waiting and they attacked as soon as you were free. You had never tried to fend off multiple attackers before, and found yourself quickly failing.

Tony landed and began fighting off the others who joined your attackers, but he couldn’t blast at them without fear of hitting you. You felt a rising panic as a helicopter flew up and hovered low over where you were fighting. The quinjet was nowhere in sight.

Arms grabbed you and pinned your hands behind your back, dragging you towards a ladder lowering from the helicopter. You couldn’t fight, but you refused to be taken again.

“No!” you yelled, ripping yourself from their arms. At your burst of emotion, a wave of energy pulsed from your body. Tony’s armor went dark and the helicopter lost power, crashing down the side of the building and into the street below. The energy knocked your attackers back, and before they could regain their footing a shield flew from behind you and knocked three of them out.

Steve was here, followed by Clint and Bucky. Nat held the quinjet in a hover above you and lowered a rope, which you caught so she could pull you up.

“I’m getting you out of here,” she called to you as she pulled the jet around. “The others will clean up.”

You looked out the window of the jet, worry curling in your stomach as you watched Steve fight through the HYDRA agents. As he shrank in the distance, you prayed he would be all right.
trail.content:
I’m really proud of the first part of this. The second part… well, I feel like I suck at writing action sequences. But the first part contains a few lines I read and think, “Dang, I did good,” so that’s nice.

As always, feedback is super appreciated!

Many thanks to @unwrapping for having a post on how to use the “keep reading” feature. Yay, I can use that now!

Word count: 1514

Warnings: That action sequence at the end (bad writing and angst), references to adults doing things that make me wish my mom didn’t read these (she does. *sigh*)

——————————

You landed hard on your back and for a moment you couldn’t breathe. Natasha grinned down at you in victory.

“And I win again. Really, Y/N, I expected you to be better at this after a week of training.”

“You call this training?” You groaned as you pushed yourself into a sitting position. “It’s just you showing me a move or two before knocking me on my ass for two hours.”

“Believe it or not, you are improving,” Nat assured you as she grabbed your hand and hauled you to your feet.

“Then why have I never been this sore before in my life?” You rubbed your back, wincing as you hit what had to be a pretty big bruise. “It keeps compounding. I thought yesterday was bad, but today is definitely worse.”

“And you’ll thank me for it the first time you have to work through pain on a mission.”

You glared at the pretty Russian. “I’m not joining the team, Nat. I’m just supposed to be learning how to defend myself.”

She waved off your protest. “Then you’ll thank me when you have to work through pain when fighting for your life. Until you can at least hold your own against me, we’ll keep working. Let’s run it one more time.”

“I want Steve back,” you complained.

“Ask and you shall receive.”

You whirled around to face the voice behind you, only to have Natasha flip you once again. The floor rushing up to meet you knocked the breath out of your lungs and you swore you saw Jesus.

“Damnit, Nat!” you gasped out.

“You were distracted,” she smirked.

“Of course I was distracted, my boyfriend’s back!”

Steve ducked into the ring and glanced at Natasha before smiling down at you.

“Hard at work, I see.”

“Steve,” you whined, “Nat is being mean to me.”

He laughed and held out a hand for you to grab. You shook your head.

“I think I’ll just stay down here for a while. Less distance to fall.”

Clint and Bucky wandered into the gym and saw you on your back.

“Looks like someone’s been training with Nat,” Clint teased. “How many times has she beaten you?”

“Two hundred and fifty-two times. Forty eight of those were today.”

He cracked up. “You’ve been counting?”

You sighed, sitting up and crossing your legs. “Of course I’ve been counting. I get a new bruise each time.”

“Let’s test you out,” Steve said, again holding out his hand to pull you up. You reluctantly acquiesced.

“Fine, but I want to fight Clint this time.”

“I’ll have you know I can hold my own against Nat,” Clint objected indignantly.

“And she beats you every time,” Bucky teased, elbowing him in the ribs. “Fight the woman.”

Clint assented and joined you as Steve and Natasha vacated the ring.

“You’ve got this, Y/N,” Nat assured you from the ropes. “Just remember what we’ve worked on.”

Maybe Clint wasn’t expecting you to be able to hold your own or maybe you really were getting better. For whatever reason, you found yourself reacting automatically to his attacks, and soon he was the one to hit the floor. You turned to your cheering fans to bow and he swept out a leg, knocking you down next to him.

“What did I tell you about getting distracted?” Nat laughed as you sat up and shoved Clint.

“Low blow, Barton.”

“But totally worth the look on your face,” he joked. “Next time I’ll take you down first and you can land the belated attempt to save face.”

“Next time will have to be another day,” you announced as you got up. “I get to go back to work today, and I definitely need a shower before I leave.”

“I’ll clean up and go with you.” Steve picked up his duffle.

“No, you,” you ordered, poking him in the chest, “are going to shower after I do, followed by food or whatever you need to be ready for when I get back. Tony is going with me.” You stood on your tiptoes and whispered in his ear, “You’ve been gone a week. I’m jumping you as soon as I’m off work. I want you wide awake.” With a sly grin, you stalked off to take your shower.

“Well, something’s got the Captain blushing,” Bucky teased as he and Clint followed your exit, headed to their rooms.

Natasha came up and stood beside Steve, watching you retreat across the gym. “You’ve got a special one there, Cap. Don’t let her get away.”

Steve nodded, the scarlet slowly leaving his cheeks. “Believe me, I fully intend to keep her.”

 ———-

“F.R.I.D.A.Y., tell Happy to bring the car around in fifteen minutes. I want him waiting by the curb when we step out.”

“Yes, sir.”

Tony sipped his coffee and continued to pretend to read. He had tapped into the shop’s security system and was viewing all the camera feeds on a screen carefully built into his fake newspaper. Your shift had gone smoothly so far, but it was almost 4 p.m. and that meant you were about to enter the most vulnerable part of your time outside the tower: travelling.

Happy pulled up just as you came out of the back with your purse. You nodded at Tony and he stood, taking your arm. You were both on high alert as he opened the door and you slid in.

tags: this kept me awake at night
title: quick spiderman headcanon
body:
Okay, so we’ve all talked about the Squidward joke in Infinity War, because it’s funny af. But that also means that Tony, at some point in his life, has watched Spongebob.

We also know that Peter named the AI in his suit Karen, and that there is a computer of that same name in Spongebob. Coincidence? Maybe. But Peter Parker is a Gen Z kid, and Spongebob creates the best memes, so it’s safe to say he’s watched it enough to recognize characters in it.

It has been implied that Tony and Peter have hung out together in the time in between Infinity War.

So, what if.

They watched Spongebob together.

They watched Spongebob, without any missions or injuries or superhero stuff.

Just father and son, watching a silly kids show, because they can laugh at it together.

Anyway thanks for coming to my ted talk
